Uses of Class
kodkod.engine.bool.BooleanValue

Packages that use BooleanValue
kodkod.engine.bool   
 

Uses of BooleanValue in kodkod.engine.bool
 

Subclasses of BooleanValue in kodkod.engine.bool
 class BooleanConstant
          Represents a boolean constant, true or false.
 class BooleanFormula
          Represents a non-constant boolean value.
 class BooleanVariable
          Represents a boolean variable.
 class MultiGate
          Represents a gate with two or more inputs; an AND or an OR gate.
 class MutableMultiGate
          Represents a mutable multi gate that allows incremental addition of inputs.
 class NotGate
          Represents a NOT gate.

          Returns the negation of the given boolean value.

 BooleanValue BooleanMatrix.some()

 BooleanValue BooleanFactory.toImmutableValue(MutableMultiGate g)
          Converts the given mutable gate into an immutable value and adds it to this.components.

 java.util.Iterator<IndexedEntry<BooleanValue>> BooleanMatrix.iterator(int from, int to)
          Returns an IndexedEntry-based view of the non-zero entries in this matrix, starting at the first dense entry whose index is greater than or equal to from and ending at the last dense entry whose index is less than or equal to to.
